summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2189 for the improvement of Twenty-seventh Avenue West, in the City of Seattle, from West Blaine Street to West Howe Street, by grading and curbing the same, and by the construction of concrete walks under Ordinance No. 21748, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
